comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: Taken over from a frustrated French order in February 1941, served with BOAC in Africa in WW2, sold to East African Airways in March 1948, seen here in early post-war markings. crashed Sweden January 1953

comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: Douglas C-47 Dakota is probably ZS-AVK of the South African Pan African Aviation Company Ltd which was sold to Israel in 1948

comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content: Lockheed 18-07 Lodestar G-AGBS (cn 2071), later VP-KFB 'Lake Nyasa, later SE-BUX.
